definition: Chaoshan, conurbation in the east of Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]
bamboo fish trap/used in names of places connected with Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2]

sentences.english: Pesticide plant resources are abundant in Chaoshan area of Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕地区农药植物资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: Raoping Hakka area is located in Chaoshan and Meizhou transition region.
sentences.chinese: 饶平客家地区处于潮汕与梅州的过渡地区。

sentences.english: How many years do you use Chaoshan dialect?
sentences.chinese: 你用潮汕话交流多少年了？

sentences.english: The Chaozhou Speech in Thailand has had a close contact with Tai language in hundreds years.
sentences.chinese: 数百年间汉语潮汕话与泰语有密切的接触关系。

sentences.english: Simple analysis also the decaying Reason of Chaoshan songs.
sentences.chinese: 同时简单分析潮汕歌谣日渐衰微的原因。

sentences.english: Chaoshan culture is a part of the traditional Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕文化是中华传统文化的一个组成部分。

sentences.english: Shantou belong to tide chanshan, everybody metropolis say tide Shan words.
sentences.chinese: 汕头属于潮汕，每个人都会说潮汕话。

sentences.english: As the saying goes, wives have to find a woman Chaoshan.
sentences.chinese: 俗话说，找老婆就要找潮汕女人。

sentences.english: This paper makes a analysis into the karyotype of some species of Brassica vegetables grown in Chaozhou-Shantou area.
sentences.chinese: 对潮汕地区栽培的几种芸苔属蔬菜的核型进行了分析。

sentences.english: Our restaurant mainly serves Guangdong cuisine, including Chaozhou, Shantou and Hakka dishes.
sentences.chinese: 本餐厅主理粤菜，包括潮汕菜和客家菜。

sentences.english: Such a woman among women is even worse Chaoshan.
sentences.chinese: 这种女人之中，潮汕女人尤甚。

sentences.english: Chaoshan if this is the ancient Chinese language in the Central Plains to wave a product of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕话本是古代中原汉人语言在潮地衍变的产物。

sentences.english: Gongfu Cha in the Chaozhou-Shantou, Chaozhou and current research has become a cultural one.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕工夫茶，已成为当前研究潮汕文化项目之一。

sentences.english: There is 1/4 shantounese population in HongKong.
sentences.chinese: 香港有四分之一的人口是潮汕人。

definition: Chaozhou prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]/Chaochou town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Shantou (formerly romanized as Swatow), prefecture-level city in Guangdong
Hakka ethnic group, a subgroup of the Han that in the 13th century migrated from northern China to the south
Shanwei prefecture level city in Guangdong
Wuchuan county level city in Zhanjiang 湛江[Zhan4 jiang1], Guangdong
Jiexi county in Jieyang 揭陽|揭阳, Guangdong
Chaoyang district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong
Sea of serenity (Mare Serenitatis, on the moon)/Chenghai district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong
Raoping county in Chaozhou 潮州[Chao2 zhou1], Guangdong
Puning county level city in Jieyang 揭陽|揭阳, Guangdong
Chaonan district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong
